alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 25 at 11:50AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Lake effect snow showers will affect northern Portage...southwestern Geauga...Cuyahoga...northeastern Medina...northern Summit and northeastern Lorain Counties Until 100 PM EST.... At 1149 AM EST, radar indicated snow showers along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Avon Lake to near Westlake to near Solon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility dropping to less than one mile... Light snow accumulations to one half of an inch... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Lorain, Elyria, Chardon, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Solon, Avon Lake, Hudson, Twinsburg, Streetsboro and Warrensville Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/cle and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Summit
